# Aside-right Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Full

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Nav-drawer | `:has( app-right-panel app-nav-drawer)` |
| Nav-rail | `:has( app-right-panel app-nav-rail)` |

---
